item.title: Battleships
item.description: Battleships was developed using C++ and SDL in a team of three programmers composed of Benjamin Lewis, Franz-Philippe Garcia and myself in my second year at McGill University within the context of the Software Engineering course led by JÃ¶rg Kienzle. I worked specifically on the game client, the graphics code and the art.
